data.title: Past Performers by Year – The 2023 Blues Blast Music Awards
data.text:
2008 Blues Blast Music Awards November 2nd, 2008 Buddy Guy’s Legends, Chicago, IL – Magic Slim & the Teardrops, Lurrie Bell, Nick Moss, Gerry Hundt, John Németh, Kilborn Alley Blues Band, Dave Riley & Bob Corritore, Eden Brent, Sugar Ray Norcia, Teeny Tucker.

2009 Blues Blast Music Awards October 29th, 2009 Buddy Guy’s Legends, Chicago, IL – Too Slim & The Tail Draggers, Gina Sicilia, Robin Rogers, Eden Brent, Shirley Johnson, Albert Castiglia, Dave Gross, Cedric Burnside and Lightnin’ Malcolm, Chris James & Patrick Rynn w/ Bob Corritore, Dave Herrero, Guy King, Kenny Neal, Nick Moss & the Flip Tops w/special guest Curtis Salgado, Matthew Skollar, John Primer, Lurrie Bell, Billy Boy Arnold, Billy Branch, Carlos Johnson, Kilborn Alley Blues Band, The Insomniacs

2010 Blues Blast Music Awards October 28th, 2010 Buddy Guy’s Legends, Chicago, IL – Marquise Knox, Jackie Scott & The Housewreckers, Candye Kane w/ Laura Chavez, Zora Young, Quintus McCormick, Shaun Murphy Band, Dave Riley & Bob Corritore, Kilborn Alley Blues Band, The Cash Box Kings, Mississippi Heat

2011 Blues Blast Music Awards October 27th, 2011 Buddy Guy’s Legends, Chicago, IL – Buddy Guy, Tom Hambridge, Reba Russell Band, Tony Rogers & Sharrie Williams, Gina Sicilia & Dave Gross, Karen Lovely Band, Teeny Tucker Band, Matt Hill, Peter Parcek, Rob Blaine’s Big Otis Blues, Chris O’Leary Band, Vincent Hayes Project, The Sugar Prophets, Bob Corritore & Dave Riley, Rich Del Grosso & Jonn Richardson, Reverend Raven And The Chain Smokin’ Altar Boys, Eddie Turner, Nick Moss & The Fliptops

2013 Blues Blast Music Awards – October 31st, 2013 Buddy Guy’s Legends, Chicago, IL – Andy Poxon, Big Joe Maher, Kevin McKendree, Lil’ Ronnie, Kevin Selfe, James Buddy Rogers, Brandon Santini, Little Joe McLerran, Mike Wheeler Band, Bob Corritore & Mud Morganfield, The Cash Box Kings, Teeny Tucker, Doug MacLeod, Doug Deming Band, Sena Ehrhardt, Eddie Shaw & The 757 Allstars, Andy T & Nick Nixon Band, Albert Castiglia, Shaun Murphy Band

2014 Blues Blast Music Awards – October 23rd, 2014 – Fluid Event Center Champaign, IL – Andy T Nick Nixon Band, Back Pack Jones, Annie Mack Band, Adrianna Marie And Her Groovecutters,Brent Johnson & The Call Up, Josh Hoyer, Rachelle Coba, Lisa Mann, Bernie Pearl & Barbara Morrison, Steve Dawson, Lisa Biales, Mark T Small, Norman Taylor, Dave Riley & Bob Corritore, Bobby Rush with Blinddog Smokin’, Trudy Lynn, Tweed Funk, Shaun Murphy Band, Too Slim & The Tail Draggers, Albert Castiglia, RB Stone, Sean Chambers

2015 Blues Blast Music Awards – October 23rd, 2015 – Fluid Event Center Champaign, IL – Dan Phelps, Big Dave McLean & Steve Dawson,The Duo Sonics, Missy Andersen, Tad Robibnson, Eight O’Five Jive, Showplace Music Review featuring John Ginty, Alexis P. Suter & Slam Allen, Deb Ryder, Altered Five Blues Band, Big Harp George, Chris O’Leary Band, Andy T Nick Nixon Band, Reverend Raven & The Chain Smokin’ Altar Boys, Dave Specter Chicago Blues review featuring Bob Corritore, Oscar Wilson, Mud Morganfield and Eddy Clearwater, Markey Blue Band, Magnus Berg, Ghost Town Blues Band, Bobby Messano, Anthony Gomes

2016 Blues Blast Music Awards – September 3rd, 2016 – Fluid Event Center Champaign, IL – Bob Margolin, Dave Weld, Henry Gray, Bob Corritore, Guy King, Eugene “Hideway” Bridges, Fiona Boyes, Danielle Nicole, Anthony Geraci (w/ Monster Mike Welch), Too Slim & The Taildraggers, Peter Karp, Shaun Murphy Band, Jonn Del Toro Richardson, Shoji Naito, Big Harp George, Rooster Alley Band, Andy T-Nick Nixon Band, Markey Blue Band, Dave Muskett Acoustic Blues, Andy Poxon, Little Ronnie, Jon Spear Band, Corey Dennison Band

2018 Blues Blast Music Awards – September 29th, 2018 Tebala Event Center – Rockford, IL – Jimmy Johnson, Benny Turner, Heather Newman, Shaun Murphy Band, Karen Lovely, Ghost Town Blues Band, Sunny Lowdown, Daniel Eriksen, Ben Levin, Casey Hensley Band, Ilya Portnov, Patrick Recob, Joyann Parker, Markey Blue & Ric Latina Project, Ivy Ford Band, Orphan Jon Band,
